Plot: A man and a woman awaken to find themselves trapped in a cellar. As their kidnapper drives them mad, the truth about their horrific abduction is revealed.
Title: Captivity
Writer: Larry Cohen (screenplay), Joseph Tura (screenplay), Larry Cohen (story)
Actors: Elisha Cuthbert, Daniel Gillies, Pruitt Taylor Vince, Michael Harney
tomatoConsensus: Lacking scares or psychological insight, Captivity is a distasteful entry in the 'torture porn' subgenre.
